winashakari minis ghathana siduwu yugaya thrasthawadaya sahamulin parajaya kirimath samanga nimawu bawath ada pawathna samakami wathawaranaya thula kuda siddhiyak pilibandawa pawa janatha asa yomuwima nisa eya upayogi karagena maha aparadha rallak rate pawathina bawata mathayak godanangannata athamun uthsaha karana bawath janapathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha pawasiya.pathalaya, mathkudu, awi athata ganim pilibandawa ada athamun katha karana bawath ee siyalla palanaya karamin rajaya owun nithiya hamuwata pamunuwannata kriyakaramin sitina bawath janapathiwaraya kiya.mahanuwara asala perahara mangalyaye samapthiya nimiththen eeye (02) mahanuwara janapathi maduredi pawathi uthsawayedi janapathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha me bawa prakasha kaleya.thrasthawadin eda kala minis ghathana ha maha winashayan hethuwen rata thula siduwana kuda siddhin pilibandawa janatha asa yomu nowu bawath ada ema thaththwaya mulumanin wenaswi athi nisa gamaka siduwana kuda siddhiyak pawa ismathuwa penena bawath pawasu janapathiwaraya ewani siduwim pawa nowannata rajaya uparimayen kriyakarana bawath awadharanaya kaleya.winaya ha saradharma pawathina ratakata aparadha ralla nathikara damana eka etharam deyak nowana bawath mathrubhumiya yahapath deshayak lesa godanaganna sawoma perata aa yuthu bawath hethema kiya.jathyanthara pasalwala ithihasaya, aagama, sanskruthiya uganwanne nathi bawath mewayin ratata, jathiyata, aagamata aadaraya nokarana daruwaku bihiwannata idahara apa samajaya hadanna uthsaha kirim palak nomathi bawath ki janapathiwaraya me sambandhawa idiriyedi piyawarak ganna bawada awadharanaya kaleya.thrasthawadaya parajaya kara niwunu sanasunu ratak janathawata ada urumakaradi thibena bawath dalada wahanse.
